name: Weighting out the Storm
description:
The Fat Fortnight 2 game jam had 2 weeks to build a game for submission. This is not a result of 2 weeks, this is a result of 2 days salvaging those 2 weeks into a playable state. I'll still make the original idea and update this one since I'm disappointed in myself on how I handled this. But you can check out what this amalgamation is :3

NOTE: If at start you see a blank screen, hit enter to start. I am not sure how this bug may act throughout the rest of the game if it happens.

CONTROLS:
[WASD] to move/navigate menu
Arrow Keys to move arrow
[ENTER] to interact/confirm
